nodes.text: A Sheathipede-class transport shuttle was owned by Techno Union Foreman Wat Tambor, who brought the shuttle along when he invaded Ryloth during the Clone Wars. Tambor's T-series tactical droid, TA-175, escaped from Lessu aboard the shuttle when Jedi General Mace Windu assaulted the capital, leaving Tambor behind on Ryloth to become a Galactic Republic prisoner of war.
